TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor is any size and has spread to the lower one-third of the urethra, the lower one-third of the vagina, or the lower one-third of the anus. Cancer has not spread to the lymph nodes.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II vulvar cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de vulva en estadio II"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de vulva en estadio II

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El tumor es de cualquier tamaño y se diseminó al tercio inferior de la uretra, el tercio inferior de la vagina o el tercio inferior del ano. El cáncer no se ha diseminado a los ganglios linfáticos.
